mapper.select: select count(*) from member where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into member ( no, email, pw, reg_date, log_date, approval_status, approval_key) values (Member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{pw}, sysdate, sysdate, 1, #{approval_key})
mapper.update: update member set approval_status = 1 where email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and approval_key = #{approval_key}
update member set log_date = sysdate where email = #{email}
update member set pen_name = #{pen_name} where email = #{email}
update member set pw= #{pw, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
